Student Portals and Accounts.BLC Account Creation: Visit the BLC portal, click on 'Create Account', and use your student ID to register.
Student Portals and Accounts.DIU Student Portal Creation: Go to the DIU portal, click on 'Sign Up', and complete the form with your details.

Payments.Current Semester Payment Schema: Tuition fee is $20,000 per year, divided into two semesters. Additional fees depend on the department and batch.

Submissions.Pending Submissions: Log in to your BLC account to view pending assignments and submissions.

Assignments.Cover Page Creation: Include the subject name, teacher's name, faculty name, submission date, and your details.

Clubs.Joining Clubs: Visit the club office or contact the president via email provided on the website.
Clubs.Club Activities: Organize events, workshops, and networking opportunities for members.
Clubs.Contact Club: Contact the club via email or attend weekly meetings.

Events.Upcoming Programs: Visit https://www.daffodiluniversity.edu/events for the latest updates.

Admissions.How to Apply: Visit the admissions page and complete the online application form.
Admissions.Tuition Fees: Varies by department; refer to the payment schema.

Exams.Overlap Exam Dates: Refer to the academic calendar for specific dates.
Exams.How to Give an Overlap Exam: Contact the exam office for special arrangements.
